---
id: list-organization-teams
title: "List organization teams"
description: "Lists all teams in the organization identified by the given `orgId`. Teams are groups of organization members that can be added as participants to workspaces."
sidebar_label: "List organization teams"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: platform-api-docs/docs/seqera-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List organization teams"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/teams"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Lists all teams in the organization identified by the given `orgId`. Teams are groups of organization members that can be added as participants to workspaces.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
